snippet: Successful revolutions, as the interim government in Kiev has been learning, are a lot harder to maintain than it can seem in the bright dawn of first victories.
abstract: Memo from Kiev; Ukraine's new government faces many obstacles to establishing credibility and maintaining its successful revolution; challenges include the divide between opposition movement and Russian-speaking population, looted treasury and Russia's attempts to destabilize regime.
lead_paragraph: Successful revolutions, as the interim government in Kiev has been learning, are a lot harder to maintain than it can seem in the bright dawn of first victories.

headline.main: After Initial Triumph, Ukraine’s Leaders Face Battle for Credibility
headline.print_headline: After Initial Triumph, Ukraine’s Leaders Face Battle for Credibility
